NaClSrpcImcBuffer Struct Reference
[SRPC]

The structure used to provide a buffering layer over the IMC. More...

Data Fields

  • struct NaClImcMsgIoVec iovec [1]
  • uint32_t next_desc
  • size_t next_byte

  • NaClSrpcImcDescType descs [IMC_USER_DESC_MAX]
  • unsigned char bytes [IMC_USER_BYTES_MAX]

Detailed Description

The structure used to provide a buffering layer over the IMC.

Field Documentation

unsigned char NaClSrpcImcBuffer::bytes[IMC_USER_BYTES_MAX]

character array containing the data to be sent or received This element must be an array to ensure that proper range checking on reads and writes can be done using sizeof(bytes).

See the note in imc_buffer.c. TODO(sehr,bsy): use a preprocessor macro to assert that this element is an array rather than a pointer.

NaClSrpcImcDescType NaClSrpcImcBuffer::descs[IMC_USER_DESC_MAX]

array of descriptors to be sent or received

struct NaClImcMsgHdr NaClSrpcImcBuffer::header [read]

IMC message header.

struct NaClImcMsgIoVec NaClSrpcImcBuffer::iovec[1] [read]

IMC message descriptor.

size_t NaClSrpcImcBuffer::last_byte

index into bytes of the last data byte to be read or written

size_t NaClSrpcImcBuffer::next_byte

index into bytes of the next data byte to be read or written

uint32_t NaClSrpcImcBuffer::next_desc

index into bytes of the next descriptor to be read or written
